titleStmt.title: A nicke for neuters. A most godly and fruitfull sermon, begun and preached at Paules Crosse, the 30. day of October last, and continued & finished in Paules Church, on New-yeeres day at night. / By Thomas Burt, Preacher of the Word.
titleStmt.author: Burt, Thomas, preacher of the word.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
